q: Eric Schmidt and Larry Page said in an interview yesterday that they worked closely with each other and co-founder Sergey Brin on big decisions. The CEO shift won't result in major strategic changes, the executives said. We really agree on strategy, Larry Page said.`` This is really a way of changing the way we're maIan King decisions and the way we're operating. But I definitely don't think there will be any major changes in strategy.''
